components.name: Agent Wiz CLI
components.description: Command-line interface for extracting workflows, visualizing agent interactions, and analyzing threats.

components.name: AST-based Parsers
components.description: Static parsers for various AI frameworks that extract agent workflows, tool functions, and interactions.

components.name: Threat Modeling Engine
components.description: Module that applies threat modeling frameworks like MAESTRO to evaluate agent workflows for vulnerabilities.

components.name: Visualization Module
components.description: Generates interactive visual representations of agent workflows from extracted data.

data_flows.description: The CLI sends code directory paths to the parsers for workflow extraction.
Extracted workflows are sent to the threat modeling engine for vulnerability assessment.
Threat assessment results are sent to the visualization module for report generation.

trust_boundaries.name: User Environment
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between the user's local environment and the Agent Wiz application.

trust_boundaries.name: Threat Assessment Environment
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary where threat modeling and analysis occur, separating user data from threat modeling processes.
